text: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you do, gain an Action card costing up to 6.
name: Advance

text: +1 Action. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.
name: Advisor

text: +2 Cards; +1 Action. When you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.
name: Alchemist

text: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to 4.
name: Alms

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5.
name: Altar

text: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.
name: Ambassador

text: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.
name: Amulet

text: Look through your discard pile. Shuffle all but up to 5 cards from it into your deck. Gain a Duchy.
name: Annex

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.
name: Apothecary

text: +1 Action. Trash a card from your hand. +1 Card per Coin it costs. +2 Cards if it has  in its cost.
name: Apprentice

text: When you gain a Treasure, move 1 Victory Token from its pile to this. When you gain a Victory card, take the Victory Tokens from this. — Setup: Put 8 Victory Tokens on the Silver and Gold piles.
name: Aqueduct

text: +1 Action. Set aside the top 3 cards of your deck face down (you may look at them). Now and at the start of your next two turns, put one into your hand.
name: Archive

text: At the start of your Buy phase, you may discard an Action card. If you do, take 2 Victory Tokens from here. — Setup: Put 6 Victory Tokens here per player.
name: Arena

text: Gain a card costing up to . Put it on top of your deck.
name: Armory

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +. Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly  per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.
name: Artificer

text: Gain a card to your hand costing up to . Put a card from your hand onto your deck.
name: Artisan

text: +3 Cards. You may play an Sauna from your hand.
name: Avanto

text: Put your deck into your discard pile. Look through it and put 2 Coppers from it onto your deck (or reveal you can't).
name: Bad Omens

text: +1 Action. Gain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.
name: Bag of Gold

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Take a Coin token. — Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.
name: Baker

text: Take your -1 Coin token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to 4.
name: Ball

text: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose. This is that card until it leaves play.
name: Band of Misfits

text: Gain a Gold. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes a revealed treasure other than Copper, and discards the rest.
name: Bandit

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. Gain a Spoils.
name: Bandit Camp

text: When scoring, -2 Victory Points for each Silver and each Gold you have.
name: Bandit Fort

text: Worth . When you play this, it’s worth  per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).
name: Bank

text: Gain 2 Coppers and a non-Victory card costing up to 5.
name: Banquet

text: +2 Coins. Receive a Boon.
name: Bard

text: +1 Buy. You may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.
name: Baron

text: When you buy a card, if you have 2 Coins or more left, take 2 Victory Tokens from here. — Setup: Put 6 Victory Tokens here per player.
name: Basilica

text: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. If you trashed at least one, exchange this for a Vampire. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Bat

text: When you end your turn without having gained a card, take 2 Victory Tokens from here. — Setup: Put 6 Victory Tokens here per player.
name: Baths

text: When you gain a Victory card, take 2 Victory Tokens from here. — Setup: Put 6 Victory Tokens here per player.
name: Battlefield

text: +1 Card, +2 Actions, +1 Coin.
name: Bazaar

text: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand. —  When another player plays an Attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers, putting one on top of your deck.
name: Beggar

text: +1 Coin; +1 Victory Token. Trash a card from your hand. +1 Victory Token per 2 Coins it cost, rounded down. Each other player may trash a card from their hand.
name: Bishop

text: +2 Coins. Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. Play any number of Treasures from your hand. You may buy one of the revealed cards. Put the rest on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order. Setup: Make a Black Market deck out of different unused Kingdom cards.
name: Black Market

text: +1 Card+2 ActionsWhen you gain this, take a Boon. Receive it now or at the start of your next turn.
name: Blessed Village

text: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.
name: Bonfire

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. —When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.
name: Border Village

text: +1 Buy. Once per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +1 Coin.
name: Borrow

text: +1 Buy; +. All cards (including cards in players’ hands) cost 1 less this turn, but not less than 0.
name: Bridge

text: Each other player takes his -1 Coin token. Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Buy. — While this is in play, cards cost 1 less on your turns, but not less than 0.
name: Bridge Troll

text: Gain a Silver card; put it on top of your deck. Each other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).
name: Bureaucrat

text: +1 Card. +3 Actions. Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Settlers from it and put it into your hand.
name: Bustling Village

text: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.
name: Butcher

text: Worth . —When you gain this, gain two Coppers.
name: Cache

text: +1 Action. +1 Buy. Take a Coin token.
name: Candlestick Maker

text: Worth . +1 Buy. When you discard this from play, take 6 Debt, and then you may pay off  Debt
name: Capital

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. At the start of your next turn, +1 Card.
name: Caravan

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. At the start of your next turn, +. — When another player plays an Attack card, you may play this from your hand. (+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)
name: Caravan Guard

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.
name: Cartographer

text: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards. —  When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.
name: Catacombs

text: +1. Trash a card from your hand. If it costs 3 or more, each other player gains a Curse. If it's a Treasure, each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
name: Catapult

text: +1 Action. Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded.
name: Cellar

text: 2When you gain this, trash up to 4 cards from your hand.Heirloom: Haunted Mirror
name: Cemetery

text: +1 Action. For the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action. (This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)
name: Champion

text: Trash this. Gain a copy of a card you have in play.In games using this, when you gain a card costing  or more, you may exchange it for a Changeling.
name: Changeling

text: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.
name: Chapel

text: +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. The player to your left reveals the top card of their deck. If your card costs more, + and +1.
name: Chariot Race

text: When you play this, choose one: +1 Buy and +2 Coins; or the next time you buy a card this turn, you may also gain a differently named card with the same cost.
name: Charm

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, + and +1 Buy.
name: City

text: +2 Actions. Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Action card revealed.
name: City Quarter

text: At the start of your next turn, gain a card to your hand costing up to 4 Coins.
name: Cobbler

text: Worth . When you play this, put it on your Tavern mat. — Directly after resolving an Action, you may call this, for +2 Actions.
name: Coin of the Realm

text: When you buy an Action card, if you have a copy of it in play, take 2 Victory Tokens from here. — Setup: Put 6 Victory Tokens here per player.
name: Colonnade

text: Worth 10 Victory Points
name: Colony

text: +You may play an action card from your hand that you don't have a copy of in play. If you do, +1 Action.
name: Conclave

text: Gain 2 Silvers. +1 Victory Token per Silver you've gained this turn.
name: Conquest

text: +. If you’ve played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card; +1 Action.
name: Conspirator

text: Worth 3 Coins. +1 Buy. When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can’t buy that card this turn.
name: Contraband

text: Worth 1 Coin.
name: Copper

text: +4 Cards; +1 Buy. Each other player draws a card.
name: Council Room

text: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper. Choose one: +; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.
name: Count

text: +1 Coin; +1 Buy. When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.
name: Counterfeit

text: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.
name: Counting House

text: Reveal a card from your hand. For each type it has (Action, Attack, etc.), choose one: +1 Action; or +1 Buy; or +; or gain a Gold. The choices must be different.
name: Courtier

text: +3 Cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
name: Courtyard

text: Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.
name: Crossroads

text: If it's your Action phase, you may play an Action from your hand twice. If it's your Buy phase, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice.
name: Crown

text: Worth 1 Victory Point — When you gain or trash this, +1 Victory Token and gain a Silver.
name: Crumbling Castle

text: Set aside any number of Treasures you have in play, face down (under this). While any remain, at the start of each of your turns, put one of them into your hand.
name: Crypt

text: +2 Cards. Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand. —  When you trash this, +3 Cards.
name: Cultist

text: Worth -1 Victory Points.
name: Curse

text: Worht 3 Coins. When you play this, gain a Curse.
name: Cursed Gold

text: +2 ActionsDraw until you have 6 cards in hand.  When you gain this, receive a Hex.
name: Cursed Village

text: +2 Coins. Each other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).
name: Cutpurse

text: You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 to 6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Dame Anna

text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 to 6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card. Worth 2
name: Dame Josephine

text: +2 Actions. Each other player discards the top 2 cards of his deck, and trashes one of them costing from 3 to 6. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Dame Molly

text: You may gain a card costing up to . Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 to 6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Dame Natalie

text: +2 Coins. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 to 6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Dame Sylvia

text: +5 Coins. You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don’t, trash this. —  When you gain this, gain two Ruins.
name: Death Cart

text: When you gain an Action, move 1 Victory Token from its pile to this. When you buy a Curse, take the Victory Tokens from this. — Setup: Put 2 Victory Tokens on each non-Gathering Action Supply pile.
name: Defiled Shrine

text: At the start of your Buy phase, return this, and you can't buy Actions this turn.
name: Deluded

text: If you don't have Deluded or Envious, take Deluded.
name: Delusion

text: +1 Buy. Gain a Silver.
name: Delve

text: At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.  This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).
name: Den of Sin

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.
name: Develop

text: If the number of cards you've gained this turn is: 2+, gain an Imp from its pile; 1, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins; 0, gain a Gold.
name: Devil's Workshop

text: Worth 2 Coins. When you play this, +1 Coin per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).
name: Diadem

text: +2 Cards. If you have 5 or fewer cards in hand (after drawing), +2 Actions. — When another player plays an Attack card, you may first reveal this from a hand of 5 or more cards, to draw 2 cards then discard 3.
name: Diplomat

text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Disciple

text: Trash a card from your hand. If it costs 1 Coin or more, gain a cheaper card and a Gold.
name: Dismantle

text: Put this on your Tavern mat. — Worth 4 Victory Points if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 Victory Points).
name: Distant Lands

text: Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order. — When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck; trash it, discard it, or put it back.
name: Doctor

text: Gain a Province. If you do, +9 Victory Tokens.
name: Dominate

text: After this turn, put all cards from your deck and discard pile into your hand, trash any number, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.
name: Donate

text: +1 Buy  Receive one of the set-aside Boons (leaving it there).  Setup: Set aside the top 3 Boons face up.
name: Druid

text: +2 Coins. Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back. — In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.
name: Duchess

text: Worth 3 Victory Points.
name: Duchy

text: Worth 1 Victory Point per Duchy you have.
name: Duke

text: +1 Action. Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.
name: Dungeon

text: Put this on your Tavern mat. — When you gain a card costing up to , you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.
name: Duplicate

text: +2 Coins. Trash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.
name: Embargo

text: +5 Cards. Discard 3 cards. —When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.
name: Embassy

text: +1 Card. +1 Action. +1 Coin.  — When you gain this, if you have at least 5 Action cards in play, +2 Victory Tokens.
name: Emporium

text: +2 Cards. +2 Actions. You may reveal a Gold or Plunder from your hand. If you do not, set this aside, and return it to the Supply at the start of Clean-up.
name: Encampment

text: Until your next turn, the first time each other player plays an Action card on their turn, they get +1 Card and +1 Action instead of following its instructions. At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.
name: Enchantress

text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. You may trash this. If you do, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
name: Engineer

text: At the start of your Buy phase, return this, and Silver and Gold make 1 Coin this turn.
name: Envious

text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.
name: Envoy

text: If you don't have Deluded or Envious, take Envious.
name: Envy

text: Worth 1 Victory Point.
name: Estate

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a cheaper Spirit from one of the Spirit piles.
name: Exorcist

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.
name: Expand

text: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.
name: Expedition

text: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.
name: Explorer

text: Worth 2 Victory Points for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (round down).
name: Fairgrounds

text: +2 Cards - When you discard this other than during Clean-up, you may set it aside, and put it into your hand at end of turn.
name: Faithful Hound

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Each other player gains a curse.
name: Familiar

text: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Discard the Actions. Shuffle the rest into your deck.
name: Famine

text: +1 Buy. If there are 4 or more Victory Tokens on the Farmers' Market Supply pile, take them and trash this. Otherwise, add 1 Victory Token to the pile and then +1 Coin per 1 Victory Token on the pile.
name: Farmers' Market

text: +2 Actions. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.
name: Farming Village

text: Worth 2 Victory Points. — When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 2 Coins more than the trashed card.
name: Farmland

text: If you have at least 5 cards in hand, discard an Action or Treasure (or reveal you can't).
name: Fear

text: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 3 Silvers in your deck. — When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.
name: Feodum

text: Move your -2 Coins cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost 2 Coins less on your turns, but not less than 0 Coins).
name: Ferry

text: +2 Actions, +1 Buy; +2 Coins.
name: Festival

text: +2 Actions, +1 Coin. At the start of your next turn: +1 Action; +1 Coin.
name: Fishing Village

text: +2 Cards. Gain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.
name: Followers

text: If you aren't the player with Lost in the Woods, take it, take 3 Boons, and receive the Boons in any order.
name: Fool

text: Worth 1 Coin if it's the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, otherwise worth 4 Coins.  When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand, to gain a Gold onto your deck.
name: Fool's Gold

text: +1 Action; +1 Buy. Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.
name: Forager

text: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.
name: Forge

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. — When you trash this, put it into your hand.
name: Fortress

text: +1 Buy. When you play this, double your coins if you haven't yet this turn. — When you gain this, gain a Gold per Gladiator you have in play.
name: Fortune

text: +2 Coins. Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory or Curse card. They put it on top and discards the rest.
name: Fortune Teller

text: +3 Cards. +1 Action. Discard 2 cards.  — When you buy this, +1 Buy.
name: Forum

text: When scoring, 15 Victory Points if you have at least 10 Coppers.
name: Fountain

text: +2 Cards +1 Action Discard a card. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Fugitive

text: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).
name: Gardens

text: +2 Cards. Set aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.
name: Gear

text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal an Action. Discard the other cards and set aside the Action. At the start of your next turn, play it twice.  (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Ghost

text: +2 Cards. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.
name: Ghost Ship

text: At the start of your next turn, +1 Card and +1 Action. - This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).
name: Ghost Town

text: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +1 Coin. If it's face up, +5 Coins, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.
name: Giant

text: +2 Coins. Reveal a card from your hand. The player to your left may reveal a copy from their hand. If they do not, +1 Coin and trash a Gladiator from the Supply.
name: Gladiator

text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, you may trash a card from your hand.
name: Goat

text: Worth 3 Coins.
name: Gold

text: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards. Discard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.
name: Golem

text: +1 Buy; +2 Coins. Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 Victory Token.
name: Goons

text: +1 Action. Choose one; you get the version in parentheses: +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from his hand and gain a card costing exactly  1 Coin (2 Coins) more.
name: Governor

text: Worth 5 Victory Points — When you gain this, reveal your hand. +1 Victory Token per Victory card in your hand and/or in play.
name: Grand Castle

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +2 Coins. - You can’t buy this if you have any Copper in play.
name: Grand Market

text: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.
name: Graverobber

text: Gain a Copper onto your deck.
name: Greed

text: +1 Card. +1 Action. — While this is in play, when you gain a Victory card, +1 Victory Token
name: Groundskeeper

text: Until your next turn, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you. At the start of your next turn, +1 Coin.  This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).
name: Guardian

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Put this on your Tavern mat. — At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.
name: Guide

text: +2 Coins. — While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.
name: Haggler

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Action. You may discard a card; if you do, +1 Buy.
name: Hamlet

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.
name: Harbinger

text: Worth 2 Coins. Worth 2 Victory Points
name: Harem

text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.
name: Harvest

text: Worth 2 Victory Points — When you gain this during your turn, gain a Gold, and each other player with 5 or more cards in hand puts 2 cards from their hand onto their deck.
name: Haunted Castle

text: Worth 1 Coin - When you trash this, you may discard an Action card, to gain a Ghost from its pile.
name: Haunted Mirror

text: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, they puts their hand on top of their deck in any order. At the start of your next turn, +3 Cards.
name: Haunted Woods

text: If you have at least 4 cards in hand, put one of them onto your deck.
name: Haunting

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Set aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.
name: Haven

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it. — When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.
name: Herald

text: +1 Buy; +1 Coin. When you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.
name: Herbalist

text: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card that is not a Treasure, from your discard pile or your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins. —  When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman (from the Madman pile).
name: Hermit

text: +2 Coins. Gain a Treasure. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Hero

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. — While this is in play, cards cost 1 Coin less, but not less than 0 Coins.
name: Highway

text: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game: +1 Card. (This stays in play.)
name: Hireling

text: Worth 2 Coins. While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.
name: Hoard

text: Worth 0 Coins. When you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it’s a Victory card, trash this.
name: Horn of Plenty

text: +1 Buy; +3 Coins; Discard 2 cards. - When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.
name: Horse Traders

text: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.
name: Hovel

text: Worth 1 Coin — Worth 1 Victory Point per Castle you have.
name: Humble Castle

text: +4 Cards. — When this is trashed, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.
name: Hunting Grounds

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn’t a duplicate of one in your hand. Put it into your hand and discard the rest.
name: Hunting Party

text: Worth 2 Coins. When you play this, if you then have an odd number of Idols in play, receive a Boon; if an even number, each other player gains a Curse.
name: Idol

text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand. — When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.
name: Ill-Gotten Gains

text: +2 Cards  You may play an Action card from your hand that you don't have a copy of in play.  (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Imp

text: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to 4 Coins. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).
name: Inheritance

text: +2 Cards; +2 Actions. Discard 2 cards. — When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.
name: Inn

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. If it is an Action card, +1 Action; a Treasure card, +1 Coin; a Victory card, +1 Card.
name: Ironmonger

text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins. If it is an... Action card, +1 Action. Treasure card, +1 Coin. Victory card, +1 Card.
name: Ironworks

text: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game. Worth 2 Victory Points
name: Island

text: Gain a Silver. Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back. Draw until you have 5 cards in hand. You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.
name: Jack of all Trades

text: +2 Coins. Each other player discards the top card of his deck. If it’s a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise either he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.
name: Jester

text: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.
name: Journeyman

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. Trash a card from your hand.
name: Junk Dealer

text: When scoring, 5 Victory Points per differently named Treasure you have, that you have more copies of than each other player, or tied for most.
name: Keep

text: Worth 2 Victory Points per Castle you have.
name: King's Castle

text: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.
name: King's Court

text: +2 Cards; +1 Action.
name: Laboratory

text: When you gain a 2nd card in one of your turns, take 2 Victory Tokens from here. — Setup: Put 6 Victory Tokens here per player.
name: Labyrinth

text: +3 Coins. You may reveal a Gold from your hand. If you do, each other player discards down to 2 cards in hand, then draws a card.
name: Legionary

text: Gain a Gold. If you have exactly 7 cards in play, gain a Wish from its pile. Otherwise, receive a Hex.
name: Leprechaun

text: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.
name: Library

text: +1 Action. Now and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn’t affect you.
name: Lighthouse

text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.
name: Loan

text: Trash the top card of your deck. If it's a Copper or Estate, gain a Curse. Otherwise, gain a cheaper card that shares a type with it.
name: Locusts

text: +1 Action. Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.
name: Lookout

text: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).
name: Lost Arts

text: +2 Cards +2 Actions — When you gain this, each other player draws a card.
name: Lost City

text: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card to receive a Boon.
name: Lost in the Woods

text: Worth 1 Coin - When you play this, gain a Silver.
name: Lucky Coin

text: +1 Action. Choose one: Trash an Action card from the Supply, or gain an Action card from the trash.
name: Lurker

text: +2 Actions. Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Madman

text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, if there are at least 6 cards that you have exactly 1 copy of in play, trash this. If you do, gain 3 Wishes from their pile.
name: Magic Lamp

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.
name: Magpie

text: +3 Coins. Put a card from your hand on top of your deck. — When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.
name: Mandarin

text: Gain a Spoils. Each other player gains a Ruins.
name: Marauder

text: +3 Cards; +1 Buy. Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.
name: Margrave

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +1 Coin.
name: Market

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy. — When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.
name: Market Square

text: +2 Cards. Each player passes a card from his hand to the left at once. Then you may trash a card from your hand.
name: Masquerade

text: Worth 1 Coin. — When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per coin you overpaid.
name: Masterpiece

text: +1 Action. Reveal your hand. If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards. Otherwise, +1 Card.
name: Menagerie

text: You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Mercenary

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. The first time you play a Silver this turn, +1 Coin.
name: Merchant

text: +1 Buy; +1 Coin. — While this is in play, when you buy a card, add a coin token to your coffers.
name: Merchant Guild

text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.
name: Merchant Ship

text: +1 Buy; +2 Coins. You may put your deck into your discard pile. — When this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to 4 Coins, and each other player gains a copy of it.
name: Messenger

text: +2 Coins. Each other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.
name: Militia

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. You may discard 2 cards, for +2 Coins. Worth 1 Victory Point
name: Mill

text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Gain a Treasure to your hand costing up to 3 Coins more than it.
name: Mine

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.
name: Mining Village

text: +1 Action. Choose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards their hand and draws 4 cards.
name: Minion

text: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it. When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.
name: Mint

text: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +1 Coin per Copper on your Tavern mat.
name: Miser

text: -2 Victory Points
name: Miserable

text: If this is your first Misery this game, take Miserable. Otherwise, flip it over to Twice Miserable.
name: Misery

text: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.
name: Mission

text: +2 Cards. When another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.
name: Moat

text: For each card you've gained this turn, you may trash a card from your hand or a Copper you have in play.
name: Monastery

text: Trash a Copper from your hand. If you do, +3 Coins.
name: Moneylender

text: +2 Coins; +1 Victory Token.
name: Monument

text: When you are the first player to gain a Province, after that turn, each player bids once, up to 40 Debt, ending with you. High bidder gets +8 Victory Tokens and takes the debt they bid.
name: Mountain Pass

text: +2 Coins. Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse and a Copper.
name: Mountebank

text: When scoring, +2 Victory Points per differently named card you have.
name: Museum

text: +1 Action. +2 Coins. Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s the named card, put it into your hand.
name: Mystic

text: +2 Actions. Choose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.
name: Native Village

text: +2 Coins. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.
name: Navigator

text: Play a face up, non-Duration Action card from the trash, leaving it there and turning it face down for the turn.  Setup: Put the 3 Zombies into the trash.
name: Necromancer

text: +2 Actions
name: Necropolis

text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, discard any number, and put the rest back in any order. - This is gained to your hand (instead of your discard pile).
name: Night Watchman

text: +1 Coin. When you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn’t reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.
name: Noble Brigand

text: Choose one: +3 Cards; or +2 Actions. Worth 2 Victory Points
name: Nobles

text: +1 Buy; +2 Coins. — When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.
name: Nomad Camp

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. Discard a card.
name: Oasis

text: When scoring, +2 Victory Points per card you have from the chosen pile. — Setup: Choose a random Action Supply pile.
name: Obelisk

text: Discard any number of Victory cards. +2 Coins per card discarded. — Worth 3 Victory Points
name: Opulent Castle

text: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses. +2 Cards
name: Oracle

text: When scoring, +4 Victory Points per differently named Action card you have 3 or more copies of.
name: Orchard

text: If this is the first time you played an Outpost this turn, and the previous turn wasn't yours, then take an extra turn after this one, and you only draw 3 cards for your next hand.
name: Outpost

text: Worth 0 Victory Points. — When you trash this, +1 Card.
name: Overgrown Estate

text: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing up to 5 Coins. This is that card until it leaves play.
name: Overlord

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter.
name: Page

text: When scoring, +3 Victory Points per set you have of Copper - Silver - Gold.
name: Palace

text: Worth 1 Coin - Worth 1 Victory Point per Estate you have.
name: Pasture

text: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).
name: Pathfinding

text: +1 Card. +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs 5 Coins or more, put it into your hand.
name: Patrician

text: +3 Cards. Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the Victory cards and Curses into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.
name: Patrol

text: Choose two: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Buy; +1 Coin. (The choices must be different.)
name: Pawn

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.
name: Pearl Diver

text: +1 Buy; +1 Coin. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.
name: Peasant

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.
name: Peddler

text: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile. Worth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).
name: Philosopher's Stone

text: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.
name: Pilgrimage

text: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils.
name: Pillage

text: Choose one: +1 Coin per Coin token on your Pirate Ship mat; or each other player reveals the top 2 cards of their deck, trashes one of those Treasures that you choose, and discards the rest, and then if anyone trashed a treasure you add a Coin token to your Pirate Ship mat.
name: Pirate Ship

text: +1 Card  +1 Action  Discard the top Boon. You may trash this to receive that Boon twice.  Heirloom: Goat
name: Pixie

text: Gain a Curse to your hand.
name: Plague

text: Move your Trashing token to an Action Supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)
name: Plan

text: Worth 5 Coins.
name: Platinum

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. You may discard a Treasure card. If you do, add a Coin token to your coffers.
name: Plaza

text: Worth 2 Coins. +1 Victory Token
name: Plunder

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. Discard a card per empty supply pile.
name: Poacher

text: You may trash a Treasure other than Cursed Gold from your hand, for +4 Cards.  Heirloom: Cursed Gold
name: Pooka

text: +4 Coins. Reveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, (You can't go below 0 Coins).
name: Poor House

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. — When you buy this, gain another Port. (There are 12 Ports in the pile)
name: Port

text: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him. Any cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.
name: Possession

text: Worth 1 Potion.
name: Potion

text: Worth 1 Coin. +1 Buy
name: Pouch

text: Discard down to 3 cards in hand.
name: Poverty

text: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to 4 Coins. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)
name: Prince

text: +1 Buy. While this is in play, cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.
name: Princess

text: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly  more than it.
name: Procession

text: Worth 6 Victory Points.
name: Province

text: Worth 1 Coin. While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.
name: Quarry

text: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.
name: Quest

text: +3 Cards. Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of their deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order they choose.
name: Rabble

text: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.
name: Raid

text: Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of a card you have in play (or reveals they can't).  At the start of your next turn, +3 Coins.
name: Raider

text: +1 Buy. Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face up, +5 Cards.
name: Ranger

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Put this on your Tavern mat. — At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand.
name: Ratcatcher

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats). —  When this is trashed, +1 Card.
name: Rats

text: +1 Action. Trash this or a card from your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost in coins of the trashed card. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.
name: Raze

text: +1 Action. Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to  more than it.
name: Rebuild

text: Worth 2 Coins. When you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.
name: Relic

text: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand; gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than the trashed card.
name: Remake

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.
name: Remodel

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than it. If the gained card is an Action or Treasure, put it onto your deck; if it's a Victory card, each other player gains a Curse.
name: Replace

text: Gain a Curse. If you do, trash a card from your hand. +1 Victory Token per coin it cost.
name: Ritual

text: Worth 1 Coin. When you gain or trash this, gain a Silver; if it is your Buy phase, put the Silver on your deck, otherwise put it into your hand.
name: Rocks

text: +2 Coins. If there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.
name: Rogue

text: +5 Cards. Reveal your hand; discard the Coppers.
name: Royal Blacksmith

text: +1 Action. Put this on your Tavern mat. — Directly after resolving an Action, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.
name: Royal Carriage

text: Worth 2 Coins. While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.
name: Royal Seal

text: +1 Card
name: Ruined Library

text: +1 Buy
name: Ruined Market

text: +1 Action
name: Ruined Village

text: +1 Buy +3 Coins  Receive a Boon. If it doesn't give +1 Coin, each other player may receive it.
name: Sacred Grove

text: Trash a card from your hand. If it's an... Action card, +2 Cards, +2 Actions; Treasure card, +2 Coins; Victory card, +2 Victory Tokens
name: Sacrifice

text: +1 Action. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.
name: Sage

text: +1 Victory Token. Trash a Victory card from the Supply.
name: Salt the Earth

text: +1 Buy. Trash a card from your hand. +1 Coin per coin the card cost.
name: Salvager

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. You may play an Avanto from your hand. — While this is in play, when you play a Silver, you may trash a card from your hand.
name: Sauna

text: +1 Buy. Once per turn: Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).
name: Save

text: +2 Coins. You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.
name: Scavenger

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.
name: Scheme

text: +1 Buy. Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 and put the rest back in any order.
name: Scouting Party

text: +1 Action. Each player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn’t an Action. Put all of your revealed cards into your hand.
name: Scrying Pool

text: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.
name: Sea Hag

text: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).
name: Seaway

text: +1 Card  +1 Action  You may discard 3 cards. If you did, then at the start of your next turn, +.  Heirloom: Magic Lamp
name: Secret Cave

text: +2 Cards; +1 Action. Take a card from your hand and put it anywhere in your deck.
name: Secret Passage

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Trash and/or discard any number of them. Put the rest back in any order.
name: Sentry

text: +1 Card. +1 Action. Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Copper from it and put it into your hand.
name: Settlers

text: +2 Actions. Reveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.
name: Shanty Town

text: +1 Action  Discard any number of Victory cards, revealing them. +2 Cards per card discarded.  Heirloom: Pasture
name: Shepherd

text: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).
name: Silk Road

text: Worth 2 Coins.
name: Silver

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Sir Bailey

text: +2 Cards. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Sir Destry

text: +2 Buys. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Sir Martin

text: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand. Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.
name: Sir Michael

text: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card. —  When this is trashed, gain a Gold.
name: Sir Vander

text: +1 Buy  Each other player receives the next Hex.  When you gain this, gain a Gold.
name: Skulk

text: Trash this or a Castle from your hand. If you do, gain a Castle. — Worth 2 Victory Points
name: Small Castle

text: +3 Cards.
name: Smithy

text: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.
name: Smugglers

text: +2 Coins. +1 Coin per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Soldier

text: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each player who did draws a card.
name: Soothsayer

text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. If you do, choose one:. +2 Cards and +1 Action;. or +2 Coins and +1 Buy.
name: Spice Merchant

text: Worth 3 Coins. When you play this, return it to the Spoils pile. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Spoils

text: Worth 4 Victory Points — When you gain this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.
name: Sprawling Castle

text: +1 Coin. Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver. —  When you trash this, gain an Attack card.
name: Squire

text: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.
name: Stables

text: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.
name: Stash

text: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.
name: Steward

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it. — When you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.
name: Stonemason

text: +1 Buy. Discard any number of cards. +1 Card per card discarded. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded the second time.
name: Storeroom

text: +1 Action; +1 Coin. Play up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your Coins; +1 Card per Coin paid.
name: Storyteller

text: Gain an Action card costing up to 4 Coins. Set it aside. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, play it.
name: Summon

text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.
name: Survivors

text: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse. At the start of your next turn, +3 Coins.
name: Swamp Hag

text: +2 Coins. Each other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.
name: Swindler

text: If you have at least one card in hand, discard your hand, and at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Action, and +1 Buy
name: Tactician

text: Worth 1 Coin. While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.
name: Talisman

text: Add 2 Debt to a Supply pile. — Setup: Add 1 Debt to each Supply pile. When a player buys a card, they take the Debt from its pile.
name: Tax

text: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of your deck.
name: Taxman

text: Put this on your Tavern mat. — At the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile you have no tokens on (when you play a card from that pile, you first get that bonus). (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Teacher

text: +1 Victory Token. Trash from 1 to 3 differently named cards from your hand. Add 1 Victory Token to the Temple Supply pile. — When you gain this, take the Victory Tokens from the Temple Supply pile.
name: Temple

text: You may discard a Treasure to gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
name: The Earth's Gift

text: +1 Action  + 1 Coin (Keep this until Clean-up.)
name: The Field's Gift

text: You may trash a card from your hand.
name: The Flame's Gift

text: +1 Buy  +1 Coin (Keep this until Clean-up.)
name: The Forest's Gift

text: Look through your discard pile. You may put a card from it onto your deck.
name: The Moon's Gift

text: Gain a Silver.
name: The Mountain's Gift

text: +1 Card at the end of this turn. (Keep this until Clean-up.)
name: The River's Gift

text: +1 Card
name: The Sea's Gift

text: You may discard 3 cards to gain a Gold.
name: The Sky's Gift

text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them and put the rest back in any order.
name: The Sun's Gift

text: Gain a Will-o'-Wisp from its pile.
name: The Swamp's Gift

text: +2 Cards, Discard 2 cards.
name: The Wind's Gift

text: Choose an Action card in your hand. Play it twice.
name: Throne Room

text: When you trash a card, +1 Victory Token.
name: Tomb

text: +2 Coins  If you have no other cards in play, gain an Imp from its pile. Otherwise, each other player receives the next Hex.
name: Tormentor

text: +3 Cards. Each other player chooses one: discard 2 cards; or gain a Curse card to their hand.
name: Torturer

text: +1 Action. Each player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card, +1 Coin.
name: Tournament

text: When scoring, +1 Victory Point per non-Victory card you have from an empty Supply pile.
name: Tower

text: +1 Coin, Receive a Boon.  While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card onto your deck.
name: Tracker

text: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand. Gain a Silver per card you trashed.
name: Trade

text: +1 Buy; +1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat. Trash a card from your hand. - Setup: Put a Coin token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.
name: Trade Route

text: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins. — When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.
name: Trader

text: Trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, gain a silver card to your hand.
name: Trading Post

text: +3 Cards  +1 Buy  If you have 8 or more cards in hand (after drawing), trash this and gain a Treasure.
name: Tragic Hero

text: Move your +1 Coin token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Coin).
name: Training

text: +1 Action. Put this on your Tavern mat. — At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to  more than it, and put that card into your hand.
name: Transmogrify

text: Trash a card from your hand. If it is an... Action card, gain a Duchy; Treasure card, gain a Transmute; Victory card, gain a Gold.
name: Transmute

text: +2 Buys. When you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.
name: Travelling Fair

text: +1 Action; +. Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior. (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Treasure Hunter

text: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.
name: Treasure Map

text: Worth 2 Coins. When you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.
name: Treasure Trove

text: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin. When you discard this from play, if you didn’t buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.
name: Treasury

text: Gain an Estate. If you did, +1 Victory Token per card you've gained this turn.
name: Triumph

text: When scoring, +3 Victory Tokens per copy you have of the 2nd most common Action card among your cards (if it’s a tie, count either).
name: Triumphal Arch

text: Choose two: +2 Cards; or +2 Actions; or +2 Coins; or gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile.
name: Trusty Steed

text: Worth 2 Victory Points. - When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.
name: Tunnel

text: -4 Victory Points
name: Twice Miserable

text: +2 Actions. You may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.
name: University

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.
name: Upgrade

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand. —  When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may trash this. If you do, gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.
name: Urchin

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it’s a Victory card, Curse, Ruins, or Shelter, put it into your hand.
name: Vagrant

text: Each other player receives the next Hex.  Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins other than a Vampire. Exchange this for a Bat.
name: Vampire

text: +2 Coins, Discard the top card of your deck. If it is an Action card, you may play it.
name: Vassal

text: +2 Cards. Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded. Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.
name: Vault

text: Worth 1 Coin. When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.
name: Venture

text: +2 Actions. +1 Buy. +1 Coin. — When you gain this, put it into your hand, +1 Action, and if it's your Buy phase return to your Action phase.
name: Villa

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions.
name: Village

text: Worth 1 Victory Point for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).
name: Vineyard

text: When scoring, -1 Victory Point per card you have after the first 15.
name: Wall

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. — At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.
name: Walled Village

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.
name: Wandering Minstrel

text: Reveal cards from your deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or 4 Coins. Trash it and discard the rest.
name: War

text: +3 Cards; +1 Action. Discard 3 cards.
name: Warehouse

text: +2 Cards. For each Traveller you have in play (including this), each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs 3 Coins or 4 Coins. — When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.
name: Warrior

text: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand. When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.
name: Watchtower

text: +1 Victory Token. Gain a Gold.
name: Wedding

text: If it's your Night phase, each other player receives the next Hex. Otherwise, +3 Cards.
name: Werewolf

text: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards; +1 Buy.
name: Wharf

text: Choose one: +3 Cards and add 1 Victory Token to the Wild Hunt Supply pile; or gain an Estate, and if you do, take the Victory Tokens from the Wild Hunt Supply pile.
name: Wild Hunt

text: +1 Card  +1 Action  Reveal the top card of your deck.  If it costs 2 Coins or less, put it into your hand.  (This is not in the Supply.)
name: Will-o'-Wisp

text: If your deck and discard pile are empty, gain 3 Golds.
name: Windfall

text: +4 Coins; +1 Buy. Put this on your Tavern mat. — At the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least 2 Coins unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.
name: Wine Merchant

text: +1 Action  Return this to its pile. If you did, gain a card to your hand costing up to 6 Coins.
name: Wish

text: +1 Card; +1 Action. Name a card. Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.
name: Wishing Well

text: +2 Cards. Each other player gains a Curse card.
name: Witch

text: When scoring, -3 Victory Points per card you have exactly one copy of.
name: Wolf Den

text: +1 Card; +2 Actions, +1 Buy
name: Worker's Village

text: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
name: Workshop

text: +2 Cards. Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand. If he doesn’t, he gains a Curse. Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing  or  to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.
name: Young Witch

text: You may trash an Action card from your hand for +3 Cards and +1 Action.
name: Zombie Apprentice

text: Trash the top card of your deck. You may gain a card costing up to 1 Coin more than it.
name: Zombie Mason

text: +1 Card  +1 Action  Look at the top card of your deck.  Discard it or put it back.
name: Zombie Spy
